ComicInfo.Summary: Bounty Hunter Wars Part II: Matson and Manara are relaxing after picking up a bail jumper. Bilal comes in and simply takes their catch. Sam, Twitch and Jinx turn up just too late to find Bilal but are on his tail.
ComicInfo.Title: Bounty Hunter Wars Part II
